DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study validate accuracy SPIROCOR System indicate presence significant coronary artery disease ( S-CAD ) , define ACC/AHA Guidelines , subject suspect S-CAD .
DOC.brief_title: SPIROCOR Coronary Outcome Respiratory Stress Examination
DOC.criteria: Subject suspect SCAD Subject able perform guide breathe protocol comply study requirement Subject able agrees sign inform consent form Resting ( supine ) ECG evidence STsegment depression ≥ 1 mm lead leave bundle branch block significant arrhythmia Current digoxin therapy Subject severe valvular heart disease Subject congestive heart failure NYHA class III/IV Subject know history myocardial infarction ( ST elevation non ST elevation ) Subject previous coronary revascularization : CABG PCI Subject pacemaker ICD control sinus Morbidly obese subject ( BMI ≥ 40 ) Subject significant medical condition , investigator 's discretion , may interfere subject 's optimal participation study ; Subject currently participate another investigational product clinical study investigator believe may interfere outcome study
